entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
